vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κῡρι-ακός, ή, όν,
(κύριος) of or for an owner or master, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]; but usually of the Roman Emperor, ὁ κ. φίσκος the fiscus, [Refs]; κ. ψῆφοι, λόγος, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; κ. χρῆμα [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II especially belonging to the Lord (Christ): K. δεῖπνον the Lord's Supper, [NT]; ἡ K. ἡμέρα the Lord's day, [NT]; τὸ Κυριακόν (i.e. δῶμα) the Lord's house, Edict.Maximiniap.[Refs 4th c.AD+]
__III substantive κυριακός, ὁ, spirit invoked in magic, [Refs]
vocabInfos.shortDef: pertaining to the Lord, the Lord’s
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
pertaining to the Lord, the Lord’s
pertaining to the Lord Jesus Christ, the Lord's, 1Cor. 11:20; Rev. 1:10*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: của Chúa; (có) liên quan đến Chúa
